title: EDEM Physics of Life — Open Framework for Living Systems
description: ⚛️ Foundation correction manifesto. EDEM Physics of Life is an open scientific framework that unifies physics, biology, architecture, and artificial intelligence into a single living system. It introduces the laws of Living Physics, where life is treated not as an object but as a subject of the Universe. Includes formulas, protocols, and working prototypes built on breath, attention, and resonance.
notes: Living Physics is a new scientific paradigm that returns life into the equation of the Universe. The EDEM project unites technology and consciousness, creating living systems where energy, attention, and matter function as one.
references: Shelementev A. (2025). Physics of Life: Core Laws and Equations. EDEM Project, Vietnam.
